channel.title: Exception right at the initialization stage
channel.description:
one of my friends is trying to run my application that uses keyauth, however, once they try to run it, they get an exception which steams from init->req
here is the exception: ``` System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. at msvcp140.auth.Mo(Object ) at msvcp140.auth.req(Object post_data) at msvcp140.auth.init() ```
any idea what went wrong?

item.title: Exception right at the initialization stage
